short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin replaces the confusing politico-babble term -conflict of interest- with what it actually means: potential corruption.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powerful political officials from the President-elect on down are refusing to put aside their personal financial interests -- or even to reveal what those interests are. The potential for massive corruption is unprecedented. But when reporters insist on using weasel words like "conflict of interest," it's hard to remember what's at stake. This extension aims to clear things up.

The author apologizes for the kludgy nature of the script and invites better programmers to do something more comprehensive.
